channel.title: Cesar B. Rocha
channel.description: Personal website of Cesar B. Rocha

item.title: Who am I? What am I doing here?
item.description: Hi there. I’m Cesar B. Rocha. I’m a world citizen, human-being with his ambitions, virtues and limitations. I was brought up to a middle class family and grew up in Sao Paulo, Brazil. My ancestry speaks to the Brazilian diversity: I’m a mix up of Portuguese, Austriac, and Japanese people. Yes, I’m 25% Japanese: my grandmother’s family fled Japan in the 1930’s.
